Pre-Game Insights: Austria and Serbia commence their preparations for Euro 2024 with a friendly match on June 4, 2024.
Austria finished second in Group F of their qualifying group for Euro 2024.
Serbia finished second in their qualifying group for Euro 2024.
Austria have been drawn in Group D for Euro 2024, where they will face Poland, Netherlands, and France.
Serbia will face Slovenia, Denmark, and England in Group C of Euro 2024.
Austria's form in all competitions is L-W-W-W-W-W.
Serbia's form in all competitions is L-W-L-D-L-W.
Key players to watch include Christoph Baumgartner for Austria and Dusan Vlahovic for Serbia.
The average number of goals in meetings between Austria and Serbia is 3.75.
Austria have a winning streak of 5 matches.
Austria score 2.6 goals when playing at home and Serbia score 1 goal when playing away on average.
Betting tips include both teams to score, Austria to win, and Vlahovic to score anytime.
Austria have 2.10 odds of winning, 3.30 odds for a draw, and 3.35 odds for Serbia to win.
There are no major injury concerns for either team.
Austria's predicted lineup is Lindner(GK); Posch, Danso, Wober, Mwene; Sabitzer, Seiwald; Laimer, Baumgartner, Wimmer; Gregoritsch.
Serbia's predicted lineup is Rajkovic(GK); Veljkovic, Gudelj, Pavlovic; Zivkovic, Lukic, Maksimovic, Kostic; Milinkovic-Savic; Vlahovic, Mitrovic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at Ernst Happel Stadion.
Kick-off times are 06:45 PM (GMT), 02:15 PM (EST), and 12:15 AM (IST).
Telecast details include Sony Sports Network and Sony Liv in India, Premier Sports 2 in the UK, ESPN and FOX Sports in the USA, and no telecast in Nigeria.
